name: Super Racing Rush
description:
RUSH!
RACING!
AND TRANSFORM!

Enter the world you`ve never experienced before!
100+ Levels!
10+ cars!
5+ roles!
5+ Worlds of wonder!

Stunning 3D World by our new comic rendering engine!

You will see lava, thunder, storm, stones and aerolite!
Yeah, your only target is to get higher scores by switch on the road. But you just don`t know how many ways you can achieve the target! Tons of methods to get high score!

Bored of traditional real cars? Give you more fun than just ferrari,aston martin or lamborghini. We have super F1, legendary 4X4 offroad , fantastic space ship and so many more!

The roles with tranform ability! YES! You can be Dragon, Space Ship, and even robot! Let`s think big!

Slide to switch! Slide to jump!
So easy! So much fun!

Challenge players all around world!
Download and Rank now!

Join the SUPER RACING RUSH world!
